patterns: What is the name of this college?
What's the name of the college?
responses: This college name is Smt. Indira Gandhi College of Engineering or SIGCE in short.
Name of this college is Smt. Indira Gandhi College of Engineering.
Smt. Indira Gandhi College of Engineering - SIGCE
Plot No. 1, Sector 8, Ghansoli, Navi Mumbai -400701
We accept VISA, Mastercard.
We accept most major credit cards.

patterns: What is the per year fees
responses: 1,00,000 per year for General/Open Category, and for other Categories please contact our office. Contact No.: +91-8080949300.

patterns: What are the hours in which visit college?
responses: 9am-5pm Monday-Friday, except weekends!

responses:
These are the Following bracnhes:

patterns: What is the name of Principal?
responses: Honourable and Respected , One of a kind Dr. Sunil Chavan.

patterns: Do your college have a playground?
responses: Yes, we do have a Playground, but it's under-construction.

patterns: How many companies visit the college?
responses: Our college gives best placement for students as SIGCE is the Placement Capital of Navi Mumbai
More than 150 companies visit our college every year for Recruitment.

patterns: How far is Ghasoli Station from college?
How far the Station is from this college?
Which is the Nearest Railway Station?
Where is the nearest Bus Stop from college?
responses: For Public Trasport both Railway and Bus are available. Ghansoli Railway Station is on 15 minutes walk from college and Bus Stop is just outside of the college.
